display_name: Percentage of total estimated sleep duration with < 75% oxygen saturation from type IV home sleep apnea test
description: Sleep duration is the interval between sleep onset time and lights on/out-bed time while asleep. Estimated sleep duration, providing an approximation of total sleep duration (i.e. total sleep time) inferred from analysis of non-EEG channels [Zhao et al., 2017 (PMID:27707441)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181603/)
